subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: EVP Experiment planned in October.
author: Lisby
full_text:
On Sep 20, 2007, at 8:51 AM, Frank Ratka wrote:

>
> The researcher is always part of the equation. The spirit is not  
> talking to the recorder! I record EVP and DRV everyday, with great  
> results. I have been recording with a ITC group since March which  
> seems to have "boosted" the clarity of the messages we get.  
> Resonance is the key!

You had me at "part of the equation." You're right: resonance is the  
key, indeed, HMO.

>
> If you look at people who get consistent results everytime you will  
> find that they are connected to something greater than themselves.  
> They are usually even tempered with very little extreme emotions.  
> Their interests do not lie in the mechanism of communication so  
> much or gathering evidence to prove or disprove a theory. They are  
> interested in the message and the connection we have with the  
> spirits we all have around us. Its how our own spirit (who we  
> really are) connects with the ones we are speaking with.
> Everyone has heard the term, "like attracts like". This is a crude  
> basis for resonance! Your spiritual progress or rate of vibration  
> determines what kind of etherial crowd you will attract and hang  
> out with. A lot of the viewpoints of investigators comes from the  
> belief that we are primarily physical beings. This is an automatic  
> belief because of the conditioning and programming we have received  
> by our societies all our lives. What the spirits have been telling  
> us for thousands of years in scriptures, spiritual teachings,  
> inspired philosophy and so on is that we are primarily spiritual  
> beings. We are the "ghost in the machine", not the machine.

This is what I wanted to say, too, but you said it much more  
coherently than I could have. Personal, aside, when I try to  
communicate with the Other Side, by any number of means, mediumistic  
or mechanical, I always begin by envisioning myself either picking up  
a phone with the cord running way up into a star-filled sky, or I  
imagine that I am a radio and I am tuning myself higher up the band.  
I've done this since I was a little kid.

>
> Now, I know many of you who actually take the time to read all this  
> will try to write these words off as some kind of personal belief  
> of mine or a unsupported philosophy. In fact everything I have just  
> stated is supported by 30 years of messages received from the 70's  
> to the present through ITC contacts all over the world.
>
> So to validate your belief Bill, yes it very much depends on the  
> person who is recording the EVP! ;)
>

It's also increasingly supported by quantum physics.

Ann
